content:
<rule id="logging-usage-00190" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="{*}gfc-logging{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded library - GFC Logging">
                    <description>The application embeds a Git Foundation Classes (GFC) Logging library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">GFC Logging</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
